info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 2:00PM CDT until March 31 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Richland County in southeastern Illinois... Southern Clay County in south central Illinois... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 200 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Xenia, or near Flora, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Flora around 205 PM CDT. Clay City around 210 PM CDT. Sailor Springs and Schnell around 215 PM CDT. Noble around 220 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Olney, Claremont and Dundas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
